subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Players with concussions, blown-out knees, broken bones and other injuries litter the landscape in the N.F.L., with some unable to return for the rest of the season while others are barred from practice.
snippet: Players with concussions, blown-out knees, broken bones and other injuries litter the landscape in the N.F.L., with some unable to return for the rest of the season while others are barred from practice.
